my_foodstory: Wohooo! We live here and love this place! I don’t know how much time you have, but if you do, I think you’ll like Swaram (it’s a sound garden), Solitude Farms (they serve an amazing vegetarian lunch every day), Bread and Chocolate (for the best croissants and insanely good chocolate tarts), Sadhana Forests and the Auroville Bakery!
